scripts.start: pm2 start lan-hub/index.js --name jarvis --time && pm2 logs jarvis
scripts.start-proxy: pm2 start internet-proxy/proxytunnel.cjs --name jarvis-proxy --time && pm2 logs jarvis-proxy
scripts.reboot: pm2 stop jarvis && pm2 flush && pm2 start lan-hub/index.js --name jarvis && pm2 logs jarvis
scripts.reboot-proxy: pm2 stop jarvis-proxy && pm2 flush && pm2 start internet-proxy/proxytunnel.cjs --name jarvis-proxy && pm2 logs jarvis-proxy
